# NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_0

**Case**

The number-formatter behavior as it existed prior to macOS 10.4.

## Declaration

```swift
case behavior10_0
```

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.default**: The number-formatter behavior set as the default for new instances. You can set the default formatter behavior with the class method [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/setDefaultFormatterBehavior(_:)].
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior.behavior10_4**: The number-formatter behavior since macOS 10.4.
